title: Home page - Salad And Go
description: It's a drive-thru revolution! Salad and Go brings salads & more to the drive-thru with blazing fast, friendly service and a fresh crunch of whole-food goodness
cleaned_text: Weekdays 6:30am-9pm (Breakfast until 10:30am) Weekends 7am-9pm (Breakfast until 11am) Our mission is to make fresh, nutritious food convenient and affordable for ALL. Changing the world, one salad at a time. And we know the role affordable, nutritious food plays in building strong communities. We are shaking things up by making meals that are not only convenient and affordable, but good for our guests and the local communities. The use of quality, fresh ingredients in chef-curated recipes creates nutrient rich meals that are delicious and satisfying.
